mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( article_no, article_title, article_content, party_location , user_no, create_date, file_no, is_delete, article_hit , meet_time, board_no) VALUES ( tb_recruitBoard_seq.nextval, #{article_title},#{article_content}, #{party_location, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{user_no}, sysdate, #{file_no}, #{is_delete}, #{article_hit} , to_date(#{meet_time},'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MI'), #{board_no})
